title: Five habits I use to teach myself anything  🌟 Story of how a polyglot learned how to draw

Hey guys, this is the playlist I used to learn how to draw. I got it from Angel Ganev's Patron. To get access to the playlist you do have to pay 5$ a month, but if you don't want to pay anything go to his Youtube Channel and start learning from his free tutorials.
